Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â²    Battle World: Kronos is a classic turn-based strategy game in the     Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â²    tradition of Battle Isle, Advance Wars and Panzer General. Have       Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º

Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â²      (cross-platform) or via hot-seat.                                   Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º

Ãƒâ€ºÃ‚Â²      consider your moves. Similar to 'play-by-mail', your round is       Ã‚Â²Ãƒâ€º
